album.title: The Boy Who Knew Too Much

wiki.summary: 'Rain' is the third single from Mika's second studio album The Boy Who Knew Too Much released in the United Kingdom. The song was produced and mixed by Greg Wells and features the violinist Owen Pallett. "Rain is an unapologetic '80s pop record. I bumped into producer Stuart Price while he was working with The Killers at Olympic Studios. He helped me program this. It reminded him of ABBA and Frankie Goes to Hollywood."
